main.sys
Class Global

java.lang.Object
  main.sys.Global

public class Global
extends java.lang.Object

The Global class essentially just stores variables and methods that are to be shared from other classes.

Field Summary
static double n
          Stores the refractive index of the global system.

Method Detail

matMult

public static double[][] matMult(double[][] mat1,
                                 double[][] mat2)
Performs matrix multiplication (equivalent to doing mat1*mat2 in Matlab)

Parameters:
mat1 - The first matrix to be multiplied
mat2 - The second matrix post-multiplied to mat1
Returns:
The result of mat1 times mat2
